bug.author: Fizunimo
bug.summary: i on line 75 of detect.py is always 0.
bug.description: i on line 75 of detect.py is always 0. I think enumerate should be used on line 66 instead of line 75.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Fizunimo>@Fizunimo</denchmark-link> most detection methods (webcam, images, videos) only pull a single image at a time from the dataloader, but others, such as multi-rtsp streaming, pull multiple images at a time, in which case the batch-size (and ) with be > 1.
I hadn't thought that far. Thank you.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Fizunimo>@Fizunimo</denchmark-link> you're welcome. Thanks for the inquiry, it's always good to have new people ask questions about the code.
